name: MoneyDealer
description:
A demo for a upcoming clicker game.    

Story:

You are nooby who's poor and has no money. You see a guy a few blocks away and go to speak with him. The guy makes a deal with you and then your career begins

This game is a demo! so it might be a bit boring 

Created by RoxGamer on yt who make sticknodes video's:https://youtube.com/channel/UCQTVeDdETU1Nl3YD2ygKGzg
